snippet.title: Just Say the Word! - Now Available in the Zoom App Marketplace
snippet.description:
JUST SAY THE WORD! is a new take on a familiar board and parlor game. Create fun and innovative ways to make your team guess the right word! Play hands-free, no typing required, with only the sound of your voice. Everyone from 13 to 100 year olds will love it as though they were on their very own game show – right on their own PC!

In each round, a team member becomes The Speaker, whose mission is to make their team say as many The Words as possible without using the ones that are Forbidden! Can you describe a Unicorn without mentioning “horn”, “mythical” or “fantasy”? What about “shark” without “jaw”, “bite” or “tornado”? 

Built by Doppio, the leading voice game developer founded by gaming veterans, and makers of The Vortex and PAC-MAN™ WAKA WAKA, the JUST SAY THE WORD! app for Zoom is a social multiplayer game for 4 to 10 players. No need for buttons, controllers or the keyboard – the game is easy to set up and picks up on players’ words automatically thanks to state-of-the-art voice recognition technology. All you need is a microphone to play!

To access the new JUST SAY THE WORD! game, install the latest Zoom client, and then add the game to your Zoom account at: https://doppio.games/just-say-the-word/zoom-install. 

For more information about JUST SAY THE WORD! or other titles from Doppio, please visit; https://doppio.games, 
follow us on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/doppiogames, 
Instagram at https://www.instagram.com/doppiogames, 
or join the conversation at https://www.twitter.com/DoppioGames.
